name: Hope Magician
text:
2 Level 4 monsters
If you can Pendulum Summon Level 4, you can Pendulum Summon this face-up card in your Extra Deck. You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower Pendulum Monster from your hand in Defense Position, but it has its effects negated (if any), then you can place this face-up card in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Hope Magician" once per turn. If this card is Pendulum Summoned: You can target 1 Pendulum Monster in your GY; attach it to this card as material.
pendulum_text: Once per turn, when any player's monster declares an attack: You can negate the attack, then destroy this card.
